title: Science Learning Motivation Design Strategies Based on the ARCS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Education applying science-based motivational design techniques to mobile environments for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four elements of the ARCS model (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction) to the design of science content.
Learners can accurately identify ARCS-based motivation strategies in mobile microlearning environments with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose motivation design plans utilizing the ARCS model for real-world science education scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
